${ModID}:AttackCheaperPerDebuff.NAME: Peeved
${ModID}:AttackCheaperPerDebuff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL This costs 1 less to play for each debuff you have.

${ModID}:AttackIfNotWeak.NAME: Overenthusiastic Attack
${ModID}:AttackIfNotWeak.DESCRIPTION: If you are not Weak, deal !D! damage and gain !M! Weak.

${ModID}:AttackIfTargetNotVulnerable.NAME: Target Strength
${ModID}:AttackIfTargetNotVulnerable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is not Vulnerable, deal another !${ModID}:sd! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BlockIfNotFrail.NAME: Inadvisable Rolling
${ModID}:BlockIfNotFrail.DESCRIPTION: If you are not Frail, gain !B! block and !M! Frail.

${ModID}:BlockNextTurn.NAME: Untimely Dodge
${ModID}:BlockNextTurn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:ConvertBlockToNextTurnBlock.NAME: Freeze Up
${ModID}:ConvertBlockToNextTurnBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Lose all of your block, but regain it next turn.

${ModID}:DiscardCardAndDealDamage.NAME: Whoops!
${ModID}:DiscardCardAndDealDamage.DESCRIPTION: Discard a random card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

${ModID}:DiscardImpulsiveAndDraw.NAME: Bored!
${ModID}:DiscardImpulsiveAndDraw.DESCRIPTION: Discard all your Impulsive cards. Draw a card per card discarded.

${ModID}:DiscardPlayDraw.NAME: Bright Idea
${ModID}:DiscardPlayDraw.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Play 2 random cards from your hand. NL Draw a card.

${ModID}:DoStuffThatIsDebuffed.NAME: Despite All Expectation
${ModID}:DoStuffThatIsDebuffed.DESCRIPTION: If you are...NL Weak, deal !D! damage. NL Frail, gain !B! block. NL Vulnerable, gain !B! block.

${ModID}:DrawAndGainDazed.NAME: Dither
${ModID}:DrawAndGainDazed.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Add a Dazed to your discard pile.

${ModID}:DrawAndGainMinusDraw.NAME: Dither
${ModID}:DrawAndGainMinusDraw.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Draw 1 fewer card at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:DrawOnDebuff.NAME: In Denial
${ModID}:DrawOnDebuff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, draw 1 card.

${ModID}:DrawOnPlay.NAME: Restlessness
${ModID}:DrawOnPlay.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:DrawPerDebuff.NAME: This Is Fine
${ModID}:DrawPerDebuff.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards for each debuff you have.

${ModID}:EndOfTurnDamageIfNoBlock.NAME: Recklessness
${ModID}:EndOfTurnDamageIfNoBlock.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each of your turns, if you have no block, deal !M! damage.

${ModID}:FallOver.NAME: Fall Over
${ModID}:FallOver.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Impulsive NL Gain !B! block. End your turn.

${ModID}:GainBlockOnDebuff.NAME: Unfounded Optimism
${ModID}:GainBlockOnDebuff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a debuff, gain !M! block.

${ModID}:GainEnergyAndRandomDebuff.NAME: Capricious Capering
${ModID}:GainEnergyAndRandomDebuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Randomly gain 1 Frail, Weak or Vulnerable.
${ModID}:GainEnergyAndRandomDebuff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Randomly gain 1 Frail, Weak or Vulnerable.

${ModID}:GainEnergyCannotPlayStrikesDefe.NAME: Overcomplicate
${ModID}:GainEnergyCannotPlayStrikesDefe.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E]. NL You can no longer play Strikes and Defends.

${ModID}:GainStrengthDexIfNegative.NAME: Dunderheaded Persistence
${ModID}:GainStrengthDexIfNegative.DESCRIPTION: If your Strength or Dexterity are negative, set them to !M!.

${ModID}:GainStrengthFromWeak.NAME: Overexert
${ModID}:GainStrengthFromWeak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak. NL Gain Strength equal to your Weak.

${ModID}:GainThenLoseStrength.NAME: Sprain
${ModID}:GainThenLoseStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !${ModID}:m2! strength.

${ModID}:GainVigorAndWeak.NAME: Excessive Wind Up
${ModID}:GainVigorAndWeak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Weak. NL Your next attack deals !M! extra damage.

${ModID}:ImpulsiveEnergy.NAME: Hyperactive
${ModID}:ImpulsiveEnergy.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Impulsive NL {@@}Gain{!M!|repeat= [E]|>4= !M! [E]}. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:IncreaseCostReduceOtherCardCost.NAME: Cower
${ModID}:IncreaseCostReduceOtherCardCost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this combat NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat

${ModID}:LoseOnFatalAttack.NAME: Too Easy!
${ModID}:LoseOnFatalAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, remove this card permanently from your deck.

${ModID}:MakeImpulsive.NAME: Creature of Impulse
${ModID}:MakeImpulsive.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Make a card in your hand ${ModID}:Impulsive and discard it.
${ModID}:MakeImpulsive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Make a card in your hand ${ModID}:Impulsive and put it onto your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to make Impulsive and discard
Choose a card to make Impulsive and topdeck

${ModID}:MultihitLoseStrength.NAME: Wild Flailing
${ModID}:MultihitLoseStrength.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Lose 1 Strength.

${ModID}:PlayTopCardOfDeck.NAME: Without Thinking
${ModID}:PlayTopCardOfDeck.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Impulsive NL Play the top card of your deck.

${ModID}:QuestionableTactics.NAME: Questionable Tactics
${ModID}:QuestionableTactics.DESCRIPTION: If the target has any block, deal !D! damage. NL If the target does not intend to attack, gain !B! block.

${ModID}:TopdeckAndDrawFromDiscard.NAME: Backpedal
${ModID}:TopdeckAndDrawFromDiscard.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand onto your deck. NL Put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:TrackDamageAndHealAtEndOfCombat.NAME: Thick-headed
${ModID}:TrackDamageAndHealAtEndOfCombat.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 energy at the start of each turn. NL At the end of combat, heal for all damage taken after playing this card.

${ModID}:TransferDebuffs.NAME: Contagious Incompetence
${ModID}:TransferDebuffs.DESCRIPTION: Apply a copy of each debuff you have.
${ModID}:TransferDebuffs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transfer your debuffs to the target.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
